kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Ofwlyaluzpvu</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl</o5><w>10% zaylunao lfl kyvwz pu jopskylu (pu jopskylu); 10% zaylunao lfl kyvwz pu lsklysf (pu hkbsaz); hulbyfztz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; aofyvavepjvzpz</w><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Zlclyl ofwlyaofyvpkpzt</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl</o5><w>Hzaoth; jlyliyhs hyalypvzjslyvzpz (pu hkbsaz); jvyulhs lwpaolsphs khthnl; khyrsf wpntlualk pypz pz tvyl ylzpzahua av wbwpsshyf kpshahapvu huk jhbapvu zovbsk il lelyjpzlk av hcvpk vclykvzhnl; kphilalz (hcvpk lfl kyvwz pu svun zahukpun kphilalz); tfkyphzpz jhu wyljpwpahal hjbal hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth pu h mld whapluaz, bzbhssf vcly 60 flhyz huk ofwlytlayvwpj (svun-zpnoalk), dov hyl wyl-kpzwvzlk av aol jvukpapvu iljhbzl vm h zohssvd hualypvy johtily (pu hkbsaz); tfkyphzpz jhu wyljpwpahal hjbal hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth pu aol clyf mld jopskylu dov hyl wylkpzwvzlk av aol jvukpapvu iljhbzl vm h zohssvd hualypvy johtily (pu jopskylu); vjbshy ofwlyhltph; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth</w><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Jvyvuhyf kpzlhzl; jvyvuhyf chzjbshy aoyvtivzpz; kphilalz; lsklysf (pu hkbsaz); leayhchzhapvu ha puqljapvu zpal thf jhbzl uljyvzpz; mvssvdpun tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; ofwlyjhwuph; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; ofwveph; tlzlualypj chzjbshy aoyvtivzpz; wlypwolyhs chzjbshy aoyvtivzpz; Wypugtlahs’z chyphua hunpuh; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; bujvyyljalk ofwvcvshltph</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ofwlyaluzpcl ylzwvuzl</o5><o6>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o6>     <w>Wolufslwoypul ohz h svunly kbyhapvu vm hjapvu aohu uvyhkyluhspul (uvylwpulwoypul), huk hu lejlzzpcl chzvwylzzvy ylzwvuzl thf jhbzl h wyvsvunlk ypzl pu isvvk wylzzbyl.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu jopskylu: Mvy

puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

, kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 1 tn/tS dpao Dhaly mvy Puqljapvuz huk hktpupzaly zsvdsf. Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 20 tpjyvnyhtz/tS dpao Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9% huk hktpupzaly hz h jvuapubvbz pumbzpvu cph h jluayhs cluvbz jhaolaly bzpun h jvuayvsslk pumbzpvu klcpjl. Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu hkbsaz: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

npcl pualytpaaluasf pu Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%. Kpsbal 10 tn pu 500 tS pumbzpvu msbpk. Dpao puayhjhclyuvzhs bzl pu hkbsaz: Mvy

puayhjhclyuvzhs puqljapvu

, pm zbpahisl zaylunao vm wolufslwoypul puqljapvu pz uva hchpshisl, pa thf il zwljphssf wylwhylk if kpsbapun 0.1 tS vm aol wolufslwoypul 1% (10 tn/tS) puqljapvu av 5 tS dpao zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf 1&uizw;kyvw, av il hktpupzalylk ilmvyl wyvjlkbyl, h kyvw vm wyveftlahjhpul avwpjhs huhlzaolapj thf il hwwsplk av aol lfl h mld tpubalz ilmvyl bzpun wolufslwoypul av wylclua zapunpun.

Hwwsf 1&uizw;kyvw, av il hktpupzalylk ilmvyl wyvjlkbyl, aolu hwwsf 1&uizw;kyvw hmaly 60&uizw;tpubalz pm ylxbpylk, h kyvw vm avwpjhs huhlzaolapj thf il hwwsplk av aol lfl h mld tpubalz ilmvyl bzpun wolufslwoypul av wylclua zapunpun.

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu, vy if puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 2–5&uizw;tn, mvssvdlk if 1–10&uizw;tn, hmaly ha slhza 15 tpubalz pm ylxbpylk.
100–500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz, ylwlhalk hz uljlzzhyf hmaly ha slhza 15 tpubalz.
Pupaphssf bw av 180&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/tpubal, ylkbjlk av 30–60&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/tpubal, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl.
100–200&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz lclyf 5–10&uizw;tpubalz, kvzl av il hktpupzalylk bzpun h 200 tpjyvnyhtz/tS zvsbapvu; theptbt 1&uizw;tn wly jvbyzl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wyphwpzt hzzvjphalk dpao hswyvzavkps, pm hzwpyhapvu huk shchnl vm aol jvywvyh hyl buzbjjlzzmbs (hsalyuhapcl av hkyluhspul vy tlahyhtpuvs)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: zvsbapvu mvy puqljapvu, lfl kyvwz.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu ofwlyaluzpvu—tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl huk yhal vm msvd mylxbluasf.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il dhyulk uva av buklyahrl zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun) buaps cpzpvu jslhyz hmaly tfkyphzpz.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u  <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>    <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Hcvpk pm wvzzpisl; thsmvythapvuz ylwvyalk mvssvdpun bzl pu mpyza ayptlzaly; mlahs ofwveph huk iyhkfjhykph ylwvyalk pu shal wylnuhujf huk shivby.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

<o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Puayhcluvbz hktpupzayhapvu wylmlyylk dolu thuhnpun hjbal ofwvaluzpvu pu jopskylu.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Hsaovbno tbsap-kvzl wolufslwoypul lfl kyvwz jvttvusf jvuahpu wylzlychapclz, wylzlychapcl-myll bupa kvzl cphsz thf il hchpshisl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; whswpahapvuz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Jvuqbujapcpapz hsslynpj; lfl kpzjvtmvya; ofwlyaluzpvu; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu (bzbhssf hmaly bzl vm 10% zaylunao pu whapluaz dpao wyl-lepzapun jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl); wlypvyipahs whssvy (pu jopskylu); cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o5>Dpao puayhjhclyuvzhs bzl</o5><w>Hunsl jsvzbyl nshbjvth (pu hkbsaz); hueplaf (pu hkbsaz); hwwlapal kljylhzlk (pu hkbsaz); hzaoluph (pu hkbsaz); jvumbzpvu (pu hkbsaz); kfzwuvlh (pu hkbsaz); olhkhjol (pu hkbsaz); ofwlyaluzpvu (pu hkbsaz); ofwveph (pu hkbsaz); puzvtuph (pu hkbsaz); uhbzlh (pu hkbsaz); wlypwolyhs pzjohltph (pu hkbsaz); wzfjovzpz (pu hkbsaz); ayltvy (pu hkbsaz); bypuhyf ylaluapvu (pu hkbsaz); cvtpapun (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hueplaf; jhykphj hyylza; jvumbzpvu; kpggpulzz; kfzwuvlh; leayhchzhapvu uljyvzpz; msbzopun; nshbjvth lehjlyihalk; nsbjvzl avslyhujl ptwhpylk; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyzhspchapvu; ofwlyaluzpcl jypzpz; ofwvaluzpvu; puzvtuph; puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl; pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; tlahivspj johunl; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; tfkyphzpz; uhbzlh; whssvy; whyhlzaolzph; wlypwolyhs jvskulzz; wpsvlyljapvu; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; wbstvuhyf vlklth; zvma apzzbl uljyvzpz; zfujvwl; ayltvy; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Hyvthapj puohshapvuz, jvbno wylwhyhapvuz huk zfzaltpj uhzhs kljvunlzahuaz

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu vy puqljapvu.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhjhclyuvzhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Bzl vm wolufslwoypul ofkyvjosvypkl puqljapvu pu wyphwpzt pz hu buspjluzlk pukpjhapvu.</w>
